content: अपार {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Shoreless. {@--2@} Boundless, unbounded, unlimited; अपारस्याप्रमेयस्य परं पारमुपाश्रिते <ls>Rām.</ls> unfathomable, of great length. {@--3@} Inexhaustible, immense, great (अधिक); <ls>Rv. 5. 87. 6.</ls> {@--4@} Out of reach. {@--5@} Difficult to be crossed; difficult to be surmounted or overcome (as an enemy); रावणश्च महाशत्रुरपारः प्रतिभाति मे . <ls>Rām.</ls> --रं {@--1@} A kind of mental satisfaction or acquiescence; or, reverse of mental acquiescence, nonacquiescence. {@--2@} The opposite bank of a river. --रा The earth.
